title: Textra SMS
summary: Textra is a seriously beautiful, feature rich SMS and MMS app.
developerAddress:

descriptionHTML:
Want a beautiful, super fast and highly customizable alternative to your stock Android messaging app?

Well today is your day. Textra is simply outstanding!

Comes with a bunch of great features, notably 180+ material design theme, bubble & app icon colors. Dark, light & auto-night modes, multiple bubble styles, scheduled (future) SMS & MMS, stop during send, slide to delete, slide to call, quick snap camera, multi-select picture gallery, quick reply popup, awesome MMS GROUP messaging, quick voice memos, GIFs, 21 text sizes, message blocker / blacklisting, pin-to-top, automatic video & picture compression, plus heaps more!

Customize your preferred theme & bubble colors, signatures and notifications (icon color, LED color, sound, vibration, privacy, reminders and muting) PER CONTACT as well.

Get all the latest (Unicode 9) 2000+ Android, Twitter, Emoji One & iOS style emojis including diversity (skin tone). Just pick your preferred emoji style and express yourself!

New: Copy Partial Text inside a bubble, tap a bubble to check out this great new feature!

It's pretty special; try it, tell your friends, shout from the treetops, but most of all enjoy it.

Fully compatible with Pushbullet, MightyText, Android Wear and Android Auto (car) for enhanced notifications and quick reply.

DUAL SIM: Textra now fully supports dual sim devices for Android 5.1 and above for both SMS and MMS.

All Textra features are free forever. Occasionally you'll see an ad, or you can choose to make a once only in-app purchase to remove ads forever.

Support, Knowledge Base & Feedback @ https://textra.uservoice.com

Simple. Beautiful. Fast.
comments: Your program is full-featured with a relatively easy user interface! The interface is only slightly complicated because your program is so rich in features. I am thoroughly impressed that you after the add free. Only ask$3.49. Thank you so much for a wonderful app at and Incredibly affordable price. My wife and I have shelved Messages (the SMS app that came installed on our Galaxy S8 phones) and use Tectra exclusively.

I came from imessage to Samsung's texting app and I eventually stumbled onto this app and I'm blown away by how customizable EVERYTHING is. I'm actually stunned. Notifications are so custom that I almost never actually go into the app to use it. Free trial does expire and ads do arrive but I instantly purchased the full app. It was cheap and I'll GLADLY support these devs.

Can't say enough good things. It's interface is beautiful and simple but with plenty of customizations. I don't pay to unlock/remive ads on many apps but I did with this one because I want to see it supported and it's my daily driver.
Wonderful app I've had installed since its first release. Went premium instantly. Can't say there's a more fluid or feature filled messaging application.

Great! The main thing I can see that it could benefit from would be a location sharing feature. I used that a lot with Android Messaging and miss that function. The gif search isn't always great but it's way better than Android Messaging.
This app has everything and more, has great Gifs and voice text for safety and great group sharing.   The developers will add anyting you ask for if it makes sense!
recentChanges: ✔ Improved Notifications: See Settings > Customize Notifications > Mark as Read
✔ Improved Notifications: Added Rich Notification Buttons.
✔ Users can now manage their personal preference for the ad position (if not a Pro user) in Settings > Manage Ads.
